meanings.definition: One or some of a thing or things, no matter how much or many.
meanings.sent1: Can I have any of the candies?
meanings.sent2: She didn't have any money to buy a new book.
meanings.sent3: I asked if there were any unicorns in the zoo!
meanings.sent4: His heart was filled with any love for his family.
meanings.sent5: The teacher welcomed any questions from the students.

meanings.definition: One or some indiscriminately of whatever kind.
meanings.sent1: Do you have any in your collection?
meanings.sent2: I don't have any preference for the color of the car.
meanings.sent3: The party had any decorations you could imagine!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like any sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The artist used any colors to create a vibrant painting.

meanings.definition: One or some indiscriminately of whatever kind.
meanings.sent1: Is there any left in the jar?
meanings.sent2: He didn't have any interest in the topic.
meanings.sent3: The cat could catch any mouse that entered the house!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like any music to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The chef used any spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
